issue.title: [CF 558] Savage roar buff is not displaying
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Add icon from spell book or enter id 52610.
2. Set icon type to buff/debuff.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The icon should show when a spell is successfully cast. Nothing.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.0.2 (r559)

Do you have an error log of what happened?
I don't know how i can get log.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S52610 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user LynxSE | Imported from CurseForge issue #558 | Raw

comments.body:
Looks to be working fine to me. Try replacing the spellID with the spell name - this is the most common issue with buff/debuff icons not working correctly.

Also, and I have to ask just to be sure, is TellMeWhen locked? It must be locked for icons to function - type '/tmw' to toggle between locked and unlocked states.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It work. I just need to type spell name and 3 other spell id appeared. 127538 is correct for this spell. (52610 i get from dragging icon from spell book.). And yes tmw is locked. Thanks for help.


> Posted by CurseForge user LynxSE
